page.title: 01LLANGOLLEN,A TOURIST CENTRE.
page.content: Although only half of the old {Market}town of Llangollen is represented in this block,it is still by far the most dominant feature.The land rises quite steeply from the town in the north of the block to part of the Berwyn Range of mountains in the south.The{A.5.,}London to Holyhead route, runs along the northerly edge of the block.The majority of the land cover is dominated by farmland with some coniferous woodland. The following pages are mainly concerned with the town area which is steeped in{Local History.}This is reflected in many of the pages.The main theme is that of{Tourism,}where places of interest have been developed to that end.This can best be seen on pages 5-11,and14-17.{Farming}and the little{Industry}there is, can be seen on pages 12 and 13.
